customer_reviews.title: Might Be a Knock Off
customer_reviews.text: Naturally I'd prefer to get this product $15 cheaper as it is sold here, but I did a side by side comparison of the more expensive product I purchased in Sephora and it's not the same. This product isn't bad, but the real deal is smoother and more moisturizing. Perhaps the product is expired, and that's why they sell it cheaper - or it's a knock off. I will not purchase this or any other beauty products on Amazon as this is not the first suspect product I've received. The other was Juice Beauty Hydrating Mist - definitely a knock off.

customer_reviews.title: Expired product? Dirty bottle. Made skin burn.
